item.title: gganimate con 'babynames'
item.description: ¿Qué es gganimate? library(tidyverse) library(lubridate) library(gganimate) library(png) library(gifski) library(babynames) babynames_year <- babynames %>% group_by(year, sex) %>% summarize(suma=sum(n)) xxxx babynames_year %>% ggplot(aes(x = sex, y = suma, fill= sex )) + geom_bar(stat= "identity", color = "white", show.legend = FALSE) + geom_text(aes(label = as.numeric(suma)), position = position_dodge(0.9), vjust= 1.2, size = 5, color = "white")+ scale_fill_manual(values = c("orange", "darkgrey")) + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) + theme_minimal()+ enter_appear() + transition_states(year, transition_length = 1.
